title: guruguhAya bhaktAnugrahAya
sahitya:
guruguhAya bhaktAnugrahAya kumArAya namO namastE


anupallavi

 guruguhAya bhaktAnugrahAya guNA tItAya rUpa rahitAya 
harihara virinci rUpAya saccidAnanda svarUpAya shivAya


caraNam   sakalAgama mantra sAra jnAya sat-sampradAya sarva jnAya sakaLa 
niSkaLa prakAshakAya sAma rasya sampradAyakAya vikaLEbara 
kaivalya dAnAya vikalpahInAya vijnAnAya shuka vAmadEva 
vandita padAya shuka vAmadEvamuktipradAya
